author: Joey Duran
comment: Works great, very easy to use. And if you have any problems, just email the dev, he is very helpful 👍

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content:
Thanks for the nice words, Joey!
I'm always happy to help.

title: Great

author: Mad Season
comment: Before you leave bad review email dev he is very helpful👍👍👍

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content: Thanks, I'm always happy to help!

author: Rick Rivera
comment: Great support, great dev and great set of widgets they look great on my g watch.  Keep up the great work

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content: Thanks for the great review Rick, much appreciated!

author: Fred Lechuga
comment: After some initial issues, I got help from dev.  I suggest that you click on "Read More" in the Requirements section so you can see the other apps you need to have installed and the steps you need to follow.  The video will also help you too.  Hoping in the future the skin will include the battery levels for the watch and phone.

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content:
I'm happy to help, Fred & glad I could assist you to get it working.

Thanks for the review!

title: Looks Great So Far

author: Brandon Moreo
comment: I like these clocks a bit Confusing at first but is wonderful after you get used to it

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content: Thanks for the kind words, Brandon!

title: Different

author: Jason Ryszka
comment: Fully customizable, no noticeable battery impact, and the sweet sweet love for your device that only Zooper can provide. Thanks to the dev yet again.
title: Zooper for your watch.

author: Rob Grellman
comment: Seriously, I would give 10 stars if it were possible, the response for help & assistance is phenomenal, and the best part is how creative you can be with the watch face, you will not be disappointed, ENJOY 😎

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content: Thanks for the awesome review, Rob!

title: Awesome Awesome Awesome!!!

author: Chris Doan
comment: This app fills in the gap of the Google Wear platform where the ability of creating custom watch face is missing. The first watch face that's capable of displaying colors in low power mode. The app has so many options so you can desire your own custom watch face to your liking.

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content:
Thanks for the awesome review, Chris!
Very much appreciated!

title: Awesome App

author: IDLE 0095
comment: Best watch face I've used.  Works great.  The dev is amazing.  Try this out and you will be very impressed.
title: Amazing

author: Spencer McClendon
comment: Perfect addition for the LG G Watch collection.

reply.author: Zooper Wear
reply.content: Thanks for the nice  review, Spencer, much appreciated!

title: Excellent
